the instructions below petal begin with 8 chain and work in rounds don t turn your work round 1 7 single_crochet round 2 1 chain 3 single_crochet 1 half_double_crochet 1 double_crochet 5 double_crochet in last stitch 1 double_crochet 1 half_double_crochet 3 single_crochet round 3 1 chain 6 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in next stitch 5 times 6 single_crochet finish off the flower center round 1 5 chain join with a st st to form a ring round 2 3 chain 9 double_crochet into the ring join with a st st in 1st double_crochet round 3 3 chain 1 double_crochet 2 double_crochet in next stitch 9 times join with a st st in 1st double_crochet finish off neaten loose ends and sew petals and flower center together embroider the flower with very basic embroidery stitches you could make
